snippet: After being held scoreless by the Royals for six innings, the Yankees managed only one run for the third time in their last five games.
abstract: Kansas City Royals defeat New York Yankees, 5-1.
lead_paragraph: After being held scoreless by the Royals for six innings, the Yankees managed only one run for the third time in their last five games.

headline.seo: Bats Go Quiet as Yankees Lose Again
headline.main: Bats Go Quiet as Yankees Lose Again
headline.print_headline: Bats Go Quiet As Yankees Lose Again
